channel.title: [delta] need help with private chat!
channel.description:
im having a small problem with private chat. when somebody logs in the message reads "playername has logged in" but when they log out it reads "playername has logged in" anybody knows how to solve this, i've looked in all the obvious files client.java, player.java, textHandler.java am i looking in the right places?
thanks
EDIT: i don't need spoonfeed i just want to know where to look

item.title: [delta] need help with private chat!
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

yeah i guess u are …
CTRL+F then search for it

Read full topic
